sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Grid } from 'semantic-ui-react'; function Lyrics() { return(

"Disavowed"

You can't run away from the world
That you created to hide the shame
Of all that you couldn't be
And now you see what you've done
You can't hide the fact that
Every single word that you say
Is just another lie

One day you'll see that life is no fantasy

(Chorus)
How can I ever forget
The day you'll one day regret
When you decided there was no longer a use for me
And now the tables turned
When will you ever learn
There's no denying that I never really needed you

Was I just a pawn in your twisted game
I never thought I'd be so blind
The trust that you betrayed
You can't deny who you are
Does it hurt to know
I'm every little thing in this world
That you've desired

One day you'll see that life is no fantasy

(Chorus)

You said that you were my friend
I won't let you use me again
I won't let you use me again

(Chorus)

"Failure to Resist"


Well I know the fear of letting go
Its harder than you know
We've been through this before
I just can't take it anymore
And now the secrets out
How did this come about
You dare to tell me that your better off without
You looked me in the eyes
To softly say goodbye

(Chorus)
And I can't believe
Why would you just turn your back on me
You said this love would never die
But now you say goodbye

And were you just afraid
Of the promise that we made
It's hard to understand
How this got so out of hand
And if you only knew
Just what you put me through
I never thought that you could be so damn untrue
You threw this love awry
And now I ask you why

(Chorus)
I never thought it would end like this
A simple matter of a failure to resist
How can you live with yourself
No regrets, no shame
Another pawn in this game you play
So go away

(Chorus)

"Never Say Goodbye"


For so long I've dreamed
Hoped my wish would become my reality
You were the answer to my prayers
But sometimes I can't believe that your truly there

So close your eyes
And say goodnight
I know that tomorrow will be all right
And in my heart
You're love resides
I promise I will never leave your side
So much left unsaid
Its all right
Just try and rest your weary head
Its too much to comprehend
But I know that these feelings will never end

So close your eyes
And say goodnight
I pray that tomorrow will be all right
And in my heart
You're love resides
I swore that I would never leave your side

She tries her hardest to disguise
The sad look in her eyes
I'll welcome with embrace
God please let me take her place

So close your eyes
And say goodnight
I swear that time will someday make it right
And when my heart
No longer tries
I know I'll once again be by your side

I will wait for that day
I'll think about you everyday
Though my world
Has been torn apart
Your love still lingers in my heart

"Broken Promises"


You could never find the words to say
To make us all understand why you left that day
I hope it hurts to know that we
Never needed you from the start
We reassembled the pieces that you tore apart
And all the lies that we believed
You said you'd never leave

(Chorus)
So tell me why you failed to try
We never believed you would say goodbye
The day you left with no regrets
You left us alone here
The day we'll never forget

When you were making the choice to depart
Did you consider the adverse effects
Of a broken heart
You sealed your fate alone
Were you
Ever concerned if we'd survive
When you had made the decision
That changed our lives
And did we ever cross your mind
The ones you left behind

(Chorus)

And we tried to leave it all behind
But no one thought you'd be so blind

(Chorus)

"Walk Away"


I close my eyes and look away
This life you've slowly brought to shame
With no regrets you chose to lie
And hurt the ones who only tried
To show you love and keep you alive
And still you chose to chase your high
I won't be there when nothing remains
I've watched your life go down the drain

And when you couldn't face the truth
You lied and said you'd make it through
The wasted tears of those who cried
And only tried

(Chorus)
So walk away
Don't say goodbye
Just leave this life behind
I know you'll miss it all one day
And on that day
I'll walk away

These empty streets you walk alone
Forced to make it on your own
No ones there
You suffer the loss
This path in life comes at a cost
Have you no shame for the pain that you gave
To the ones that still hope to save
Your life from this ill-fated path that you chose
And this life that you slowly dispose

(Chorus)
Don't dare to try
To make me change my mind
You gave it all away on that day
On that day you walked away

There is no time
Just swallow your pride
And face the tears of those who cried
And only tried

(Chorus)
Don't dare to try
To make me change my mind
You gave it all away on that day
On that day you walked away

"Cold November Day"


Sitting by the window
Waiting for you to come back home
I'm lost without you
How could you leave me here alone
You were my hero
You picked me up when I was down
Gone forever
You promised you'd always be around

But where did you go

Startled by the screaming
I ran to see what could be wrong
How could you leave me
You said I'd be better off with you gone
You were my hero
But now I don't know what I believe
You said I'm sorry
Whatever you do don't follow me

And as I watched you walk away
I tried my best to disobey

(Chorus)
Left alone
Alone in this world
Forever to make it on my own
Feeling hopeless
But still I prayed
For you to change your mind and stay
Did I fail you
Did you here my cries
The night you said goodbye
Was there nothing that I could say
On that cold November day

Left alone in the cold
Watch you leave through the snow
Falling down from the sky
Through these tears in my eyes
Don't you leave me behind
Why can't we just rewind
Start all over again

(Chorus)

"Facade"


You know you can't run away
This living hell is here to stay
You can't rewind
Don't tell me that you tried
How can you be so blind
And now you can't take back the lies

(Chorus)
So I know you try to hide
All the fear that you keep
Buried deep inside
The sun will rise
Bring light to their eyes
They'll see right through
This despair you disguise

There's no escape from the shame
There's no one left for you to blame
So say goodbye
Now look what you've become
I'm not the only one
You'll find this hell has just begun

(Chorus)

Your pride will never confess
That you're the one who's to blame
One day you'll realize
I'm not the one who changed

(Chorus)

"23"


You said that one day you would find
A way to make it out
Take everything you learned in life
And see what it's all about
You had dreams to persevere
And hope to make them real
It's sad to say you never made it out
It seems so unreal

(Chorus) It's hard to face this world alone
And share a smile when you never know
That that smile can be forever lost
And just a memory

The scares you'd hide
Left me blind
Did I fail you as a friend
And still today
I wonder why
What caused this bitter end
This photograph is all that's left
Of the life you left behind
I look away to shake the tears I cry
When everything reminds

(Chorus)

This cryptic letter left behind
So unclear and undefined
With all the words we left unsaid
How could I have known what lied ahead

(Chorus)

"Otiose"


Embrace the silence
All alone in this tragedy you've designed
The echos haunt you
From all the lies that made you who you are

(Chorus)
There's no escaping
You can't erase it
There's nothing you can say to save yourself
Today
You had your chances
But did you ever try
When you betrayed them
It's just your heart that died

Just take a second
Reflect on all the times You left them down
You chose this conclusion
With everytime you promised that you'd
Make it right

(Chorus)
I don't ever want to be you
I won't ever become you
I don't ever want to be you
I won't ever become you

So how does it feel
To watch your family turn their backs on you

(Chorus)

"Slander (Unworthy)"


You can try your best to command it
But its my life you can't understand it
It doesn't matter if you love or you hate me
When all you've ever done is lie and berate me

There's more to life than black and white
You can't help but always thing your right
And no matter what I say or do
I know I'll never be good enough for you

(Chorus)
No I don't feel ashamed
When I'm the one you blame
And I'll never give a damn
Cause this is who I am

You can say what you want to disgrace me
But then you change your views when you face me
And I will never bow down to appease you
It was never my job just to please you

Not everything can go your way
And I'm telling you I'm here to stay
And no matter what you've seen or heard
Cause in the end I'll make you eat your words

(Chorus)

"Last Words"


Here I am looking back
As the world around me fades to black
All I see is you and me
You held on for so long
They never thought you'd be so strong
I never lost my faith in you
Don't worry its ok
I know the pain has gone away
And one day we will meet again
Did you wait for me to
Say goodbye and tell you I loved you
Just so I could let you know

(Chorus)
I still dream of you
I can't wait until I close my eyes
Just to see your face again
In my heart you remain
With the last words you spoke to me

Here I am sitting here
As the world around me disappears
All I see is your face
You meant so much to me
And even though I know you're free
I can't bare that you are gone
Am I dreaming
I'm so scared
That I'll never wake from this nightmare
Why is life so unfair
I'll move on and stay strong
Tell everyone that nothings wrong
But I can't hold back all these tears

(Chorus)
Your presense still lingers on
In memories where they belong
In photographs of better times
And forever in my mother's eyes
Its been so hard since you've been gone
I can't believe its been this long
So on I wait I don't to stay awake

(Chorus)
When you said you loved me

Those words still echo in my head
Forever 'till the very end
) } export default Lyrics;
